mapper.select: select NVL(a.BASIC_CODE, 'N') from TB_BASICSCHEDULE a, TB_CENTERINFO b, TB_DIDINFO c where a.CENTER_ID = b.CENTER_ID and a.CREATE_CHECK ='Y' and a.DID_DOWNCHECK ='N' and a.CENTER_ID = c.CENTER_ID and c.DID_ID = #{didId} and TRIM(c.DID_MAC) = #{didMac}

SELECT a.CENTER_ID , a.CENTER_NM , c.BASIC_CODE , c.BASIC_GROUP_NM FROM TB_CENTERINFO a , TB_BRODSCHEDULE b, TB_BRODBASICGROUP c WHERE a.CENTER_ID = b.CENTER_ID AND b.BASIC_FILE_ID = c.BASIC_CODE(+) AND CENTER_GUBUN = #{centerGubun} ORDER BY CENTER_ID DESC
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BASICSCHEDULE(BASIC_SCHEDULE_SEQ, CENTER_ID, BASIC_CODE, CREATE_CHECK, CREATE_REGDATE) values (BASICBRODSECHEDULE_SEQ.nextval, #{centerId}, #{basicCode}, #{createCheck}, sysdate)

insert into TB_BASICSCHEDULE(BASIC_SCHEDULE_SEQ, CENTER_ID, BASIC_CODE, CREATE_CHECK, CREATE_REGDATE ) select BASICBRODSECHEDULE_SEQ.nextval , a.CENTER_ID, a.BASIC_FILE_ID, 'Y', sysdate FROM TB_BRODSCHEDULE a, TB_CENTERINFO b WHERE a.CENTER_ID = b.CENTER_ID AND a.BASIC_FILE_ID = #{basicCode}
mapper.update: update TB_BASICSCHEDULE set BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode}, CREATE_CHECK = #{createCheck} where CENTER_ID = #{centerId}
update TB_BASICSCHEDULE set CREATE_CHECK = #{createCheck} where BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode} and CREATE_CHECK = #{preCreateCheck}
update TB_BASICSCHEDULE set CREATE_CHECK = #{createCheck} where CENTER_ID = #{centerId} and CREATE_CHECK ='Y'
update TB_BASICSCHEDULE set DID_DOWNCHECK = #{didDowncheck} where CENTER_ID = #{centerId} and BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode} and CREATE_CHECK ='Y'
update TB_BASICSCHEDULE set BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode} where BASIC_SCHEDULE_SEQ = #{basicScheduleSeq}
update TB_CENTERINFO set BROD_CODE = #{basicCode} where CENTER_ID = #{centerId}
update TB_CENTERINFO set BROD_CODE = '' where BROD_CODE = #{basicCode}
